attributes.action: No Civil Servant, Public Servant or Executive of any Agency or Organisation paid for from the Public Purse shall be paid more than the Prime Minister!
attributes.additional_details:
The general public are fed up to the back teeth with the jolly financial bandwagon that public and pseudo public servants manage to climb on to. No-one does a more stressful or important job than the Prime Minister, therefore no-one gets paid more than he does!

There was a time when Senior Civil Servants were respected, not paid an awful lot but rewarded with a reasonable pension and usually a well deserved Gong as compensation at the end of their tenure. Lets get back to that ethos!
